eventak

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • eventak.Event
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Party

    public abstract class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    Event Superclass. Abstract. Mother of all event type classes (Party, etc) Has: - name: Name of the event, for organizers. - venue: Venue where event is held, object of type Venue. - guestList: ArrayList of guests attending or invited to this event - date: when the event is being held. - budget: self-explanatory, of type Cost. - sponsors: who's paying for the event. ArrayList.
